name: BugChecker
description:
In this game you are tester, that testing first simulation of reality.

You will should finding and marking objects as the objects with mistakes.

If you find real bugs(that real bugs of game) you can tell me about it in the comments or in linin.m@inbox.ru.

If you find some strange text, you can also tell me about it, sorry for my low english. 

Thanks for attention on this game.
